text: Elham Kakoli (; born May 8, 1967) is an Iranian athlete specializing in lifesaving and track events. She has represented Iran in various international competitions and has achieved notable successes. == Career == Kakoli secured a silver medal at the 2018 Asian Indoor Athletics Championships as part of Iran's women's 4×400 meters relay team. She also competed in the 2018 Asian Games held in Jakarta. In 2022, she was a member of the Iranian women's beach relay team that won a silver medal at the Lifesaving World Championships in Riccione, Italy. == Achievements == * Silver medal – 2018 Asian Indoor Athletics Championships (4×400 meters relay) * Silver medal – 2022 Lifesaving World Championships (Beach relay) * Participant – 2018 Asian Games, Jakarta == References ==
title: Elham Kakoli (athlete)
